lines.gurmukhi: jYsy mwlw myr poeIAq sB aUpr kY; ismrn sMKÎw mY n Awvq bfweI kY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as main bead in a rosary is always put in the string first but being at higher place is not considered along with the other beads when the rosary is turned.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ mwlw dw SRomxI mxkw bwkI swry mxikAwˆ qoˆ aupr kr ky pRoeIdw hY, pr auh ismrn vwly mxikAwˆ dI igxqI ivc nhIˆ Awauˆdw aus dI vfweI iks kMm?

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy ibrKn ibKY pyKIAY sybl aUco; inhPl BieE soaU Aiq AiDkwrI kY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: The silk cotton tree is the tallest and mighty among the trees yet it bears useless fruits.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ ibRCwˆ ivcoˆ isMml ibRC sB qoˆ au`cw dyiKAw jwˆdw hY, pr auh bhuqy vf`px ny Pl hIn kr idqw aus dw v`fw hoxw iPr iks kMm?

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy cIl pMCIn mY aufq AkwscwrI; hyry imRq ipMjrn aUcY mqu pweI kY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as of all the birds that fly high, an eagle is supreme but when flying high, it only looks for dead bodies. What use is its ability to fly high?

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ ie`l hornwˆ pMCIAwˆ nwloˆ AkwS ivc au`cw aufdI hY, pr au`cy auf ky dyKdI hY murdy pSUAwˆ dy ipMjrwˆ nUM; iks kMm aus dI au`cI mq pweI?

lines.gurmukhi: gwiebo bjwiebo sunwiebo n kCU qYsy; gur aupdys ibnw iDRg cqurweI kY [631[

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Similarly, without the teachings of True Guru, arrogant, cleverness is condemnable. Loud singing, playing or recitation of such a person is meaningless.  (631)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqvyˆ gwauxw, vjwauxw qy sunwauxw kuJ nhIˆ hY, ijs ivc au`cI cwqurI qwˆ peI hovy, pr auh gur aupdyS qoˆ ibnwˆ hovy, qwˆ aus cqurweI nUM iDRkwr hY ]631]
